title: LF Diamond+ players for dynamic Q 5s / sub for team in tournaments
body:
Looking for positive / non-toxic players to play with me and my team in dynamic Q or subbing in for tournaments.

We play most nights but really just looking to play casual games. Usually one member of the team is unavailable on a given night so yeah...

Must be D5 or above and have voice comms. 

Add me in game, IGN: Fusion bluz0r

replies.body: Sure, hmu if you like. I play every position but support.
